abstract: Citigroup’s ad campaign for the Olympics showcases the benefits of large global banks, and other big banks are trying to soften their image.
snippet: Citigroup’s ad campaign for the Olympics showcases the benefits of large global banks, and other big banks are trying to soften their image.
lead_paragraph: At both the Democratic and Republican conventions, the nation’s biggest banks were again cast as the bad guys, criticized as being too big and too risky.

headline.main: Big Banks Make a Pitch for Hearts and Minds
headline.print_headline: Big Banks  Make a Pitch for Hearts  and Minds
